faq.p1: How do I change my password?
faq.r1: Just go to profile> settings> Change Password
faq.p2: What types of tasks can I answer
faq.r2: All tasks that appear in the main feed of the app are available for your profile
faq.r3: Upon completing a certain amount of points, you can transfer to your cryptocurrency wallet or to your bank account, the option will be available next
faq.p4: Who pays for tasks performed at Ceres?
faq.r4: They are partner companies that need the tasks to be performed by Ceres users
faq.p5: Why do we earn in Celo Dollars and not directly in Reais?
faq.r5: We are partners of Celo (www.celo.org), a new cryptocurrency that was born with the proposal of financial inclusion and to create a world of shared prosperity. The use of the cryptocurrency Celo Dollars (cUSD) as a means of payment and unit of account in our app allows us to get partner companies anywhere in the world and transfer the amounts to users at a very low cost, but we want to offer the possibility of converting Celo dollars into reais directly through the app. will be available soon
faq.p6: How to Redeem the Celo Dollars?
faq.r6: You can redeem the Celo dollars for a Celo wallet available on the Play Store and the App store when it reaches the value of $ 5. Soon we will make available within the App the possibility to convert the amount into cash in the account.
faq.p7: How do I qualify to get more tasks within the App?
faq.r7: Complete all your profile information and keep an eye out for notices in your email or App notifications.
